alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dunn; Grant; Hettinger; McKenzie; Sioux; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 22 at 4:56AM CDT until September 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT/9 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in the upper 20s to mid 30s will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...McKenzie, Dunn, Stark, Hettinger, Adams, Grant, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 10 AM CDT/9 AM MDT/ this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ this morning to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Frost could damage sensitive outdoor vegetation that is left unprotected. For the Wind Advisory, objects left unsecured outside will be blown around.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Strong winds can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Dunn; Grant; Hettinger; McKenzie; Sioux; Stark
